metadata.name: Enumerate All Information With Whoami.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of "whoami.exe" with the "/all" flag

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\whoami.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('whoami.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -all')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /all')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' –all')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' —all')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' ―all'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of "whoami.exe" with the "/all" flag
